summary: Completed frontend testing of WRC Rally Dashboard - Stage-type-driven architecture features. All 5 requested features are working correctly.
passed_tests: Times Tab: Clock button on Arrival Time triggers total time calculation - VERIFIED
Scene 1 (Live Stage): Displays stage name (SS1 TEST SS STAGE), not event name - VERIFIED
Scene 3 (Leaderboard): Loads without errors with both SS and Lap Race stage selection options - VERIFIED
Scene 4 (Pilot Focus): Loads without errors with stage type icons (Flag for SS, Rotate for Lap Race) - VERIFIED
Overall app navigation between all 4 scenes works without errors - VERIFIED
Scene 3 dropdown shows 'SPECIAL STAGES' section with SS stages
Scene 3 dropdown shows 'LAP RACES' section with Lap Race stages
Scene 4 shows 'ALL STAGE TIMES' with correct stage type icons
Scene 4 shows pilot info with car number badge
seed_data_creation: Test data created via UI: 1 pilot (Test Pilot 1, #101), 1 SS stage (SS1 - Test SS Stage), 1 Lap Race stage (Test Lap Race, 5 laps)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All stage-type-driven architecture features are working correctly. The Times Tab clock button now triggers total time calculation via handleArrivalTimeChange. Scene 1 displays stage name (not event name). Scene 3 has both SS and Lap Race stage selection options in dropdown. Scene 4 shows stage type icons (Flag for SS, Rotate for Lap Race) in the ALL STAGE TIMES section.

times_tab_clock_button.details: Clicking clock button sets arrival time and automatically calculates total time. Tested with Start Time 10:00, Arrival Time set via clock button, Total Time calculated as 879:02.916

scene_1_stage_name_display.details: Scene 1 bottom panel shows 'CURRENT STAGE' with 'SS1 TEST SS STAGE' - displays stage name, not event name

scene_3_ss_and_lap_race_options.details: Scene 3 dropdown shows 'SPECIAL STAGES' section with SS stages (Flag icon) and 'LAP RACES' section with Lap Race stages (Rotate icon)

scene_4_stage_type_icons.details: Scene 4 'ALL STAGE TIMES' section shows Flag icon for SS stages and Rotate icon for Lap Race stages

scene_navigation.details: All 4 scene tabs (1 Live Stage, 2 Timing Tower, 3 Leaderboard, 4 Pilot Focus) are visible and navigation works without errors
